creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: three figures set against a silver background in various poses; from L to R, a smiling man in a tall blue hat and red kimono dances with a fan; a kneeling figure in black and another in green gesture toward him with right arms extended up and back and left arms extended down, their hands grasping fans; a lone pine frond decorates the second panel from the L
markings: Red, square seal below signature in bottom middle section of first panel
medium: Ink, color, and silver foil on paper
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair
signed: Japanese characters in black ink in bottom middle section of first panel
title: Scenes from Kyōgen Theater [right of a pair]
